itemDisplayName: Redeploy Existing VM VHD into Availability Set
description: This template creates a VM from a existing VHD, deploys into an existing Availability Set and lets you connect it to an existing VNET that can reside in a Resource Group other than the virtual machine's. This template is useful if you have a VM that you want to re-deploy into an Availability Set.
summary: Create a VM from a specialized VHD and connect it to an existing virtual network
